page.title: 09WALKING ON MENDIP
page.content: There are many footpaths in this block, including the long distance{ {West Mendip Way}which runs from the coast to{Wells.}Nature reserves like{ {Longwood, Black Rock & Velvet Bottom} have footpaths and well signed nature trails. Many people of all ages enjoy walking through the distinctive scenery of this block, in both Summer and Winter_in fact the snow cover in the area often draws additional walkers. It is a popular area for scouts and other groups undertaking their Duke of Edingburgh's Award expeditions. Views from high ground are spectacular- across the{Severn Estuary}to Wales, the{Quantocks, Exmoor & Blackdown {Hills}in{South Somerset.
